entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023
